analysis.description:
TalentICO.ICOend (/unique_contracts/0x56acc1b1d15db819a9aaf5ef420ed6af29463ff3.sol#289-304) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(founderAddress,remainingToken) (/unique_contracts/0x56acc1b1d15db819a9aaf5ef420ed6af29463ff3.sol#300-302)

Reentrancy in TalentICO.buyTokens (/unique_contracts/0x56acc1b1d15db819a9aaf5ef420ed6af29463ff3.sol#305-326):
	External calls:
	- token.transfer(beneficiary,amount) (/unique_contracts/0x56acc1b1d15db819a9aaf5ef420ed6af29463ff3.sol#320-326)
	External calls sending eth:
	- fundTransfer(msg.value) (/unique_contracts/0x56acc1b1d15db819a9aaf5ef420ed6af29463ff3.sol#312)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- IcoTotalTokensSold (/unique_contracts/0x56acc1b1d15db819a9aaf5ef420ed6af29463ff3.sol#321-322)
	- WeiRaised (/unique_contracts/0x56acc1b1d15db819a9aaf5ef420ed6af29463ff3.sol#322)

ERC20.totalSupply should be constant (/unique_contracts/0x56acc1b1d15db819a9aaf5ef420ed6af29463ff3.sol#35)
